
=head1 NAME

image

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 figure_id (integer) - 
 position (character varying(45)) - 
 title (character varying(256)) - 
 description (character varying(2048)) - 
 attributes (character varying(128)) - 
 time_start (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 time_end (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 lat_max (character varying(45)) - 
 lat_min (character varying(45)) - 
 lon_max (character varying(45)) - 
 lon_min (character varying(45)) - 
 keywords (character varying(512)) - 
 usage_limits (character varying(128)) - 
 submission_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 create_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                  Table "gcis_metadata.image"
     Column     |              Type              |                     Modifiers                      | Storage  | Description 
 ---------------+--------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id            | integer                        | not null default nextval('image_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  figure_id     | integer                        | not null                                           | plain    | 
  position      | character varying(45)          |                                                    | extended | 
  title         | character varying(256)         |                                                    | extended | 
  description   | character varying(2048)        |                                                    | extended | 
  attributes    | character varying(128)         |                                                    | extended | 
  time_start    | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                    | plain    | 
  time_end      | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                    | plain    | 
  lat_max       | character varying(45)          |                                                    | extended | 
  lat_min       | character varying(45)          |                                                    | extended | 
  lon_max       | character varying(45)          |                                                    | extended | 
  lon_min       | character varying(45)          |                                                    | extended | 
  keywords      | character varying(512)         |                                                    | extended | 
  usage_limits  | character varying(128)         |                                                    | extended | 
  submission_dt | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                    | plain    | 
  create_dt     | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                    | plain    | 
 Indexes:
     "image_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "image_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (figure_id) REFERENCES figure(id) MATCH FULL
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "file" CONSTRAINT "file_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES image(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
